332169.「よく やってくれたキュ～！\n やはり キミに頼んで 正解だったキュ！:
You did great, kyu! I knew I was right to ask
you to find it, kyu!

332170.「ここぞとばかりに 持ちあげて……。\n まったく お前は お調子者ですキュね。:
You really went straight for the self-praise,
huh... You're quite the show off, kyu.

332171.「なんだよ。さめたふりしてるけど\n キューボだって 内心 ドキドキなんだろ？:
Come on, what's all that now? No need to put
on such a serious face. You're just as excited
as we are, aren't you?

332172.「別に……。そんな 大した物を\n 入れた記憶は ないですキュ。:
Not really... I don't really remember putting
anything all that important in there, kyu.

332173.「ちっちっち！ 大事なのは\n 何を入れたか じゃないキュ。\n 開ければ わか:
Tsk tsk tsk... The important thing is NOT what
you put inside, kyu. You'll see when I open
it, kyu.

332174.「昔は この大きさのキャラメルで\n おなか いっぱいに なったものだけど……\:
Back in the day, just one caramel of this size
would fill me right up... Can't help but feel
a little jealous of you now, kyu.

332175.「３人とも 成体になったら\n カプセルを 開けにこようキュン！:
When the three of us grow up, we'll come
back and open the capsule, kyun!

332176.「成体か……。遠い未来だキュ。\n ボクらは どうなっているんだろう。:
When we grow up, huh... That's pretty far,
kyu. Wonder what we'll be like then?

332177.「俺は 将来 航界士として\n キュレクスを捜す旅に 出ますキュ。:
When I grow up, I wanna travel as a navigator
to find Kyurex, kyu.

332178.「キューボは 向こう見ずだからなぁ。\n 未知の世界を旅して そのまま\n 帰っ:
You can be so reckless sometimes... You might
just wander into some strange world and never
come back... That worries me, kyu.

332179.「ふん！ お前のほうこそ 機巧技師の修業を\n 投げ出さないか 心配ですキュ。:
Hmph! I'm more worried that YOU might give up
on your machinist training, kyu!

332180.「まあまあ。３人そろって タイムカプセルを \n 開けにくる。そして キャラメル:
Come on, guys. The three of us will open this
time capsule and eat caramel together.
That's our promise, kyun! Sound good?

332182.「しょうがないキュ……成体になった\n ３人が そろうことは 永遠にないキュ。\:
Oh well, kyu... Now that the three of us have grown, we'll never be together like that again, kyu. That promise...it doesn't count
anymore, kyu.

332183.「約束を言いだした 当人が まっ先に\n 死んでしまうなんて……世話ないですキュ:
The very person who made that promise was the
first of us to die... It's frustrating, kyu.

332184.「そう言ってやるなよ。あいつなりに\n 精一杯 生き抜いたんだキュ。:
Don't say it like that. He lived his life to
the fullest in his own way, kyu.

332185.「せめて キャラメルだけでも食べて\n あの時 交わした約束の\n 一部くらいは:
At the very least...I'll fulfill the
caramel-eating part of the promise we
made, kyu.

332186.「そうだ！ <pc>。ロッキュネのぶんの\n キャラメルを 食べてほしいですキュ:
I got it! <pc>, I want you to
eat the caramel that was meant for Rokyune.
Please do it in his place, kyu.

332187.「カプセルの中は 時が止まっていたから\n キャラメルは 埋めた当時のままだキュ:
Time was frozen inside the capsule, so the
caramel is as fresh as it was when we buried
it, kyu. Go ahead and eat some, kyu.

332188.「ありがとう ふたりとも……。\n これで 区切りを つけられましたキュ。:
Thanks, you guys...
I think I finally have closure now, kyu.

332189.「もう ロッキュネは 俺たちの\n 思い出の中にしか いないんだなぁ……。:
So Rokyune is just in our memories now,
huh...

332190.「ボクらも いつか 誰かの思い出の\n 住人になるキュ。あいつは……ひと足\n:
Someday, we'll be part of someone else's
memories too, kyu. He...just got a bit
ahead of us, kyu.

332191.「おっと！ キミに お礼をしなきゃな。\n 心ばかりの品だけど 受け取ってほしい:
Oh, right! I have to thank you somehow.
It's just a small token, but please take it,
kyu!

332192.「それじゃ そろそろ 解散しようキュ。\n 世話になったキュ。あばよ 皆の衆！:
Alright, that's all, kyu. Thanks for your
help, kyu. Later, guys!

332193.「あいつなりに 俺を心配していたんですキュね。\n おせっかいだけど……いい奴で:
He really did care about me in his own way.
He's nosy, but...he's still a good person,
kyu.

332194.「かけがえのない友を失い 代わりに\n キミという 新たな友を得られたことに\n:
Losing one of my best friends, yet finding
such a good friend like you... I feel like
it's fate or something, kyu.

332195.「この縁を大切にして \n いつかキミに 恩返しをしたいですキュ。:
I cherish this bond we have, and someday,
I wanna repay you for it, kyu.

334559.<pc>が食べた はじめて味わうはずの\nキューロピアの キャラメルは\nなつか:
<pc> tries the Kyuropian Caramel
for the first time. It has a sweet, yet
nostalgic flavor to it...
